briefTitle: Clinical Trial of Lurbinectedin (PM01183)/Doxorubicin Versus CAV or Topotecan as Treatment in Patients With Small-Cell Lung Cancer
officialTitle: Phase III Randomized Clinical Trial of Lurbinectedin (PM01183)/Doxorubicin Versus Cyclophosphamide, Doxorubicin and Vincristine (CAV) or Topotecan as Treatment in Patients With Small-Cell Lung Cancer (SCLC) Who Failed One Prior Platinum-containing Line (ATLANTIS)
summary: Phase III randomized clinical trial of lurbinectedin (PM01183)/doxorubicin (DOX) versus cyclophosphamide (CTX), doxorubicin (DOX) and vincristine (VCR) (CAV) or topotecan as treatment in patients with small-cell lung cancer (SCLC) who failed one prior platinum-containing line.

primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Every three months up to death or study termination, a period of approximately 3.5 years
